title: RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Module Datasheet > RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK13009 QWIIC Module Overview
content: The RAK13009 is a QWIIC module, which is part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Interface series. This module has two connectors: one for the WisBlock sensor and then for the standard QWIIC interface. By using this module you can plug any QWIIC interface module into the WisBlock sensor and use it just like any other WisBlock sensor.
parent_content: The RAK13009 is a QWIIC module, which is part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Interface series. This module has two connectors: one for the WisBlock sensor and then for the standard QWIIC interface. By using this module you can plug any QWIIC interface module into the WisBlock sensor and use it just like any other WisBlock sensor.

title: RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Module Datasheet > RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Mounting Mechanism
content:
The RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC can be mounted to the IO slot of the WisBlock Base board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK13009 on a WisBlock Base board, such as the [RAK5005-O](https://store.rakwireless.com/products/rak5005-o-base-board).  
> **Image:** RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC mounting
parent_content:
The RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC can be mounted to the IO slot of the WisBlock Base board. **Figure 1** shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK13009 on a WisBlock Base board, such as the [RAK5005-O](https://store.rakwireless.com/products/rak5005-o-base-board).  
> **Image:** RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC mounting

title: RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Module Datasheet > RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Connector Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC comprises a standard WisBlock sensor connector. The WisBlock sensor connector allows the RAK13009 module to be mounted to a WisBlock baseboard, such as RAK5005-O. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **I2C** related pin, **INT** pin, **3V3_S**, and **GND** are connected to WisBlock sensor connector  
> **Image:** RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC pinout
parent_content:
The RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC comprises a standard WisBlock sensor connector. The WisBlock sensor connector allows the RAK13009 module to be mounted to a WisBlock baseboard, such as RAK5005-O. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in **Figure 2**.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **I2C** related pin, **INT** pin, **3V3_S**, and **GND** are connected to WisBlock sensor connector  
> **Image:** RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC pinout

title: RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Module Datasheet > RAK13009 WisBlock QWIIC Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Electrical Characteristics > QWIIC Interface Wiring Label > QWIIC Cable Color Scheme and Current Limitation [TABLE]
content:
> **Image:** QWIIC cable  
All the QWIIC cables follow the color scheme and arrangement, as shown in the table below.  
| Wire Color | Label      |
| ---------- | ---------- |
| Black      | GND        |
| Red        | 3.3V |
| Blue       | SDA        |
| Yellow     | SCL        |  
> **WARNING:** The recommended max current on a QWIIC cable is 226mA.
parent_content:
